component.text: As a business grows, it may also outgrow its network, requiring a network upgrade.
A careful look at the current network, as well as the new requirements in equipment and configurations can help ensure a smooth network upgrade with minimum disruption.
Whether a technician is employed inside the organization as a help desk technician , or as an on-site support technician , they represent the ISP to the customer.
Today, there are millions of individuals connected to this global network and the number is growing.

After completion of this chapter, you should be able to:
  • Perform a customer site survey.
  • Describe the importance of planning when beginning a network upgrade.
  • Describe physical topology considerations when upgrading a network.
  • Describe structured cabling.
  • Describe network configuration and interaction of network devices.
  • Describe other considerations when planning an upgrade.
